title: Lamb and lentil curry with plum chutney
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '500g stewing lamb, can be cubed', '1 teaspoon medium curry powder', '1 pinch cumin seeds', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 carrots, diced', '1 leek, diced', '1/2 onion, chopped', '80g puy lentils', '1.2L water', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 bouquet garni', 'salt and pepper', '200g plum chutney, such as Tracklements']
